I love Overwatch. I've spent 1800+ hours there, before it got shiny number 2 in its title. The thing is - I feel cheated. The game was great back in 2016, the game was great when the OG developers were still there. Those new men who sit in their seats now are outlaws, robbers and rippers. They don't care about this game at all, they only want to grab all the money you've got. Fuck you, new blizzard, fuck you. You've stolen my favourite game.

I'm still addicted to the PvP grind (and I don't know why), but I _cannot_ recommend this game to new players in it's current state.

Such a shame that Blizzard's greed ruined the Overwatch every day players loved. Overwatch WAS revolutionary...now it's _the_ joke of free-to-plays to the broader community.

Fuck Bobby Kotick.
Despites all of it's flaws and hardships since the launch of Overwatch 2. Overwatch has always had a unique, fun and fluid core gameplay experience that nothing can rival.
